member.name: RAWHID
member.summary: Describes the format of the raw input from a Human Interface Device (HID).

member.name: RAWHID.dwSizeHid
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of each HID input in bRawData.

member.name: RAWHID.dwCount
member.summary: The number of HID inputs in bRawData.

member.name: RAWHID.bRawData
member.summary: The raw input data, as an array of bytes.
